name: Criodan the Blue

skills.name: Blue Shield
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on the ally with the lowest HP for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sylvan Bulwark
skills.description: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Shield is equal to 20% of this Champion's MAX HP.

skills.name: Nature's Resilience
skills.description: Removes all debuffs from all allies, then places a [Block Debuffs] buff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Sylvan Sentinel (Passive)
skills.description: Whenever an ally under a [Shield] buff is attacked, heals them by 15% of the damage received.

book_priority: A2 and A3 for cooldowns. A1 for higher heal chance if books are available.
notes_synergy: Excellent for Doom Tower, Hydra, and Faction Wars as a cleanser and shield support.
Synergizes with shield set users and champions who benefit from Block Debuffs.
Passive healing is strong for sustained fights, especially with shield stacking.
Not a primary healer, but provides strong team sustain and protection.
Best paired with other defensive supports or provoke tanks.
